entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
